title: I didnt rececive my ward skin from Hextech crafting
body: As the title says, I cant find it and I would like to use it. So if I can get it, that would be nice.

replies.body: There is currently a bug preventing you from seeing certain ward skins, you still own them but you can't see them. A fix for this bug is under development.

There is currently a visual issue where some ward skins are not selectable despite being unlocked on the account.  If you want to give me the name of your ward skin, I'd be happy to confirm this with you.  Let me know!
